name: Grab These Nutrients
description:
You, a Graboid, and your buddies have been captured. You have been experimented on and is in need of constant nutrients. Use your seismic sense to see around you.

Controls:

Hold Left Mouse Button to move

This is a submission to the GameJolt's Together Jam:
https://gamejolt.com/games/grab-these-nutrients/730778?sort=new
https://gamejolt.com/x/permalink/jam-entry/2014
